body:
Just dropping this here, what are your opinions about it?
http://store.steampowered.com/app/376870/
For my thoughts it's that it's probably going to be the worst thing since broccoli.
I was thinking about making a series on it and just criticizing everything about it for laughs.

title: Minecraft Tellatale Game?

replies.body: You don't need to bring up 9/11 and a game and compare it to that but this looks okay, I wouldn't play it but im sure it could entertain younger kids going on a hour long car ride.

replies.body: Hopefully this isn't just a way for mojang/microsoft to pull more money out of us. It looks interesting however I would need to play it or watch gameplay to see whether I would enjoy it.
